Rogers.Township 8, Benton County, Arkansas:
Township 8 is one of thirteen current townships in Benton County, Arkansas, USA. As of the 2010 census, its total population was 12,637.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Township 8 covers an area of 8.028 square miles (20.79 km2); 8.020 square miles (20.77 km2) of land and 0.008 square miles (0.021 km2) of water.
